00047 typedef struct usb_device_t usb_device;
00048 struct usb_device_t {
00049   u8  address;
00050   u8  fullspeed;
00051   u8  bMaxPacketSize0;
00052   u8  bDeviceClass;
00053   u8  bDeviceSubClass;
00054   u8  bDeviceProtocoll;
00055   u32 idVendor;
00056   u32 idProduct;
00057   u32 bcdDevice;
00058   u8  bNumConfigurations;
00059 
00060   u8 epSize[16];
00061   u8 epTogl[16];
00062 
00063   usb_device *next;
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 typedef struct usb_endpoint_t usb_endpoint;
00068 struct usb_endpoint_t {
00069   u8 type;
00070   u8 size;
00071   u8 togl;
00072   usb_endpoint *next;
00073 };

00081   usb_transfer_descriptor_ep *next;

00083   u8 endpoint;

00092 typedef struct usb_driver_t usb_driver;
00093 struct usb_driver_t {
00094   char* name;
00095   void (*probe)(void);
00096   void (*check)(void);
00097   void * data;
00098   usb_driver *next;
00099 };

00106 typedef struct usb_irp_t usb_irp;
00107 struct usb_irp_t {
00108   //u8 devaddress;
00109   usb_device * dev;
00110   u8 endpoint;              /* ep -> bit 7 is for direction 1=from  dev to host */
00111   u8 epsize;
00112   u8 type;                  /* control, interrupt, bulk or isochron */
00113 
00114   char * buffer;
00115   u16 len;
00116 
00117   //list * td_list;
00118   u16 timeout;
00119 };
00120 
00121 
00125 typedef struct usb_transfer_descriptor_t usb_transfer_descriptor;
00126 struct usb_transfer_descriptor_t {
00127   u8 devaddress;
00128   u8 endpoint;
00129   
00130   // TODO: zusammenfassen!
00131   u8 pid;
00132   u8 iso;
00133   u8 togl;  
00134   
00135   char * buffer;
00136   u16 actlen;
00137   
00138   u8 state;
00139   usb_transfer_descriptor *next;
00140 };

00146   // driver list
00147   list * drivers;
00148   list * devices;
00149 } core;
